Package edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld

Interface GridRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HPGridTextInterface
    public interface GridRenderer
    Interface for the View/User Interface of the Model View Controller design pattern. Model is the #Grid and the Controller is #GridController

    Implementations of GridRenderer contains,

    • displayMap() method that allows the map of the Grid to be displayed on the User Interface.
    • displayMessage(String) method that allows messages to be displayed on the User Interface.
    • getSelection(ArrayList) method that allows user selection to be recieved through the User Interface.
    The above mentioned methods must ONLY be called from an implementation of the GridController.
    Author:
    Asel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

    • Method Detail

      • displayMap

        void displayMap()
        Method called by GridController.render() to display the map of the grid on the user interface

      • displayMessage

        void displayMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Method called by GridController.render(String) to display messages on the user interface
        Parameters:
        message - A string to be displayed on the user interface

      • getSelection

        ActionInterface getSelection​(java.util.ArrayList<ActionInterface> cmds)
        Method that presents the user the list of commands (cmds) in a suitable form (either text or graphical) and returns the command selected by the user.

        This method will always display to the user all commands in cmds. This method should never be called with a null or an empty list of commands (cmds) in order to avoid an infinite wait.

        Parameters:
        cmds - list of commands from which a single selection must be made and returned
        Returns:
        a chosen command from the list of commands (cmds)
